## Watcher.await() method

Start the watcher, once it emited data, stop watching.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
await(): Promise<ResultOf<SingleMode, T>>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<ResultOf<SingleMode, T>>`

## Example


```ts
const value = await watcher.await()

```
